text: Wọ́n sì fi Allāhu búra tí ìbúra wọn sì lágbára gan-an pé: "Dájúdájú tí olùkìlọ̀ kan bá fi lè wá bá àwọn, dájúdájú àwọn yóò mọ̀nà tààrà ju èyíkéyìí nínú ìjọ (t’ó ti ṣíwájú) lọ." Nígbà tí olùkìlọ̀ sì wá bá wọn, (èyí) kò ṣe àlékún kan fún wọn bí kò ṣe sísá (fún òdodo)
